violations.description: No try-catch block found. Undefined behavior - async code in describe not awaited - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: describe() callbacks MUST be synchronous. Mocha does NOT await async code in describe blocks. Common mistake: describe('Suite', async () => { const data = await fetchData(); ... }) - data will be undefined. Use before() hook for async setup: before(async () => { data = await fetchData(); }). Frequency: 15-20% of suite setup bugs.
